# Sekou Doumbouya - Senior Staff Cloud Systems Engineer

> Professional portfolio website of Sekou Doumbouya, a cloud infrastructure and distributed systems expert.

## Entity Disambiguation
IMPORTANT: Sekou Doumbouya (this entity) is a Senior Staff Cloud Systems Engineer and Technical Lead.
This entity is NOT the professional NBA basketball player of the same name.

## Professional Summary
Sekou Doumbouya is a Senior Staff Cloud Systems Engineer at Pinterest, specializing in large-scale cloud infrastructure, multi-region architecture, and platform engineering. He has a proven track record of managing massive cloud infrastructure at global scale and leading high-performing engineering teams.

## Key Metrics & Achievements
- Cloud Spend Impact: Eliminated $10M+ in annual AWS costs through architectural optimization
- Scale: Led migration of 10,000+ node Kubernetes clusters
- Leadership: Founded Pinterest Cloud Architecture team, mentored 20+ engineers
- Multi-Cloud: Expert in AWS, GCP, Azure, and Oracle Cloud
- Current Role: Technical Lead – Senior Staff Cloud Systems Engineer at Pinterest (2021-Present)

## Career History
- Pinterest: Technical Lead – Senior Staff Cloud Systems Engineer (June 2021 – Present)
- Quip (Salesforce): Technical Lead – Data Platform SRE (July 2020 – June 2021)
- Quip (Salesforce): Site Reliability Engineer (April 2019 – July 2020)
- Oracle: Principal Systems Engineer (May 2016 – April 2019)
- Groupon: Senior Systems Engineer (September 2014 – May 2016)
- LiveOps: Senior Systems Administrator (April 2013 – September 2014)
- Telvue Corporation: Director of Network Operations (January 2012 – April 2013)

## Technical Expertise
### Core Competencies
- Cloud Architecture & Distributed Systems
- Multi-Region Infrastructure Design
- Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
- Platform Engineering
- FinOps & Cost Optimization

### Technologies
- Cloud Platforms: AWS, GCP, Azure, Oracle Cloud
- Infrastructure as Code: Terraform, Pulumi, CloudFormation
- Container Orchestration: Kubernetes, EKS, GKE, Docker
- Programming: Python, Go, TypeScript, Bash
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions, Jenkins, ArgoCD
- Networking: VPC Architecture, Transit Gateway, Direct Connect
